derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from late Latin extractio(n-), from Latin extrahere 'draw out' (see extract)

encyclopedia.content: 萃取，又称溶剂萃取或液液萃取，亦称抽提，通用于石油炼制工业。

entry.def: If you say, for example, that someone is of French extraction, you mean that they or their family originally came from France.
